skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. 

The first hit has a 30% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. The second hit has a 30% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. 

Before attacking, places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. 

Grants an Extra Turn if this attack kills an enemy when Alsgor Crimsonhorn is on the same team.
